mapper.select: with daily as( with recursive cte AS( select 1 as rnum union all select rnum +1 from cte where rnum < 31 ) select lpad(rnum,'2','0') daily_usage, 0 amount from cte ) select daily.daily_usage ,(ifnull(s.sum_amount,0)+daily.amount) sum_date_amount ,sum(ifNULL(sum_amount,0)+daily.amount) over(order by daily.daily_usage) as accumulated_date_amount from daily left outer join ( select date_format(payment_date,'%Y-%m-%d') date_of_use ,date_format(payment_date,'%d') daily_usage ,SUM(amount_of_payment) sum_amount from card_usage_history where payment_date between DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{toDate}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') group by date_format(payment_date,'%d') order by payment_date ) s on daily.daily_usage = s.daily_usage order by daily.daily_usage

with daily as( with recursive cte AS( select 1 as rnum union all select rnum +1 from cte where rnum < 31 ) select lpad(rnum,'2','0') daily_usage, 0 amount from cte ), avgAmount as( select SUM(amount_of_payment) as usage_amount, date_format(payment_date,'%d') daily_usage from card_usage_history where payment_date < DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{toDate}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') group by date_format(payment_date,'%d') ) select daily.daily_usage ,round(sum(ifnull(a.usage_amount,0)+daily.amount) over(order by daily.daily_usage)/(select count(distinct date_format(payment_date,'%Y-%m')) from card_usage_history where payment_date < DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{toDate}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')),0) average_daily_usage from daily left outer join avgAmount a on daily.daily_usage = a.daily_usage group by daily.daily_usage order by daily.daily_usage

select date_format(payment_date,'%Y-%m')as "month",store_category,count(store_category) as "count",sum(amount_of_payment) as sum_of_payment from card_usage_history where payment_date between DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{toDate}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') group by store_category, date_format(payment_date,'%Y-%m') order by date_format(payment_date,'%Y-%m'),sum(amount_of_payment) desc,count(store_category) desc

select store_name,ycoordinate as lat, xcoordinate as lng from card_usage_history where payment_date between DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{fromDate}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{toDate}, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

select * from card_usage_history where 1=1 and payment_date between DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(:fromDate, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(:toDate, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
